portfolio.title: House
portfolio.description: This project aims to develop a web application for managing a modern home using the React.js library. The application will facilitate the management of various home systems, including lighting, heating, security.

portfolio.title: App Dashboard
portfolio.description: This project aims to develop a web application dashboard using the React.js library. The dashboard will provide users with a centralized interface to monitor and manage key metrics and data in real-time.

portfolio.title: Easy Rentn
portfolio.description: This project aims to develop a web platform that simplifies the process of renting and leasing properties, providing an easy-to-use interface for managing relationships between landlords and tenants.
